column1: Happy Thanksgiving! This year has been full of uncertainty struggle & unrest for all Americans. Today I encourage you to take a moment to sit down with loved ones & give thanks for the things in your life that you value the most: our family friends health communities & more. https://t.co/5FxIe1ImBK

I’m looking forward to getting back out and campaigning for @Perduesenate  and @KLoeffler. There’s still a lot of work to be done—we are making sure every legal vote is counted and every illegal vote is not. This is a real fight we need to stay engaged & WIN! #GA03 #TeamFerguson https://t.co/eWOx8Gkecl
Every legally cast vote should be counted. Votes cast illegally should not be. Anyone who is found to have maliciously violated the law should be prosecuted to the fullest extent of the law. #gapol

I believe we need to institute much tighter controls & oversight of future elections. I believe local officials should oversee elections but also believe stronger standards from the state are needed to make sure we once again have confidence in our right to free & fair elections.

I believe there needs to be a top-down investigation of the way this election was conducted in Georgia and in the other states where ballots have been randomly appearing in just the right numbers to swing elections.
This must be cured. Not because I want one candidate to win but because we cannot move forward as a supposedly free nation with this dark stain spreading over our electoral process.

This is a dark moment in America’s storied history. Our confidence—the world’s confidence—in our most sacred and fundamental right has been shaken. If the right of Americans to choose their leaders has been stolen from them everything about America stands on trembling ground.
I'm proud to support @KLoeffler for U.S. Senate in the January runoff election. #TeamFerguson is all in! Let's keep Georgia RED.
@RichforGA is the doctor we need in the U.S. House! If you haven't already voted in this year's election head to the polls tomorrow or return your absentee ballot today! https://t.co/84acTFA4sv

Yesterday was a great day for our community—we proved to Joe Biden that GA is NOT for sale! I can’t thank Michael Waddell enough for joining our team & letting our community know how much Donald Trump means to all of us. VOTE REPUBLICAN Tuesday! #GA03 #TeamFerguson @BoogerBottom https://t.co/M3OOh9Xinl

The future of America is on the line. Now more than ever we must elect strong Republican leaders like @GoodForCongress who will fight for our shared conservative values in Washington. Bob needs our support to finish strong! Contribute what you can now ⬇️ https://t.co/kD4PZnKc91
Georgia doesn’t need Sleepy Joe’s Washington DC’s bailout. We are open for business!

Voted early this morning! The future of our country is on the line in this year's election. Make sure your voice is heard and vote Republican today! #PostThePeach #BeAVoter #GA03 https://t.co/5chNuodNgs
My friend @Perduesenate drew a stark contrast to Jon Ossoff in yesterday’s debate. Was like watching the Dawgs beat TN!

Today we reflect on the important lessons learned on one of the darkest days in our history. When our nation was brutally attacked by Islamic terrorism we came together in solidarity more resilient than ever. May we never forget our first responders for their valor & dedication. https://t.co/1WZ3RU64ox
Congratulations @Clyde4Congress for winning the runoff in #GA09! I look forward to working with you in the House to keep Georgia and America great! 🇺🇸

I'm deeply saddened by the passing of my good friend and mentor Herman Cain. He was a stalwart defender of conservative ideals and values — his loss will be felt for years to come. My thoughts and prayers are with his family during this time. https://t.co/9z32F4IxWE
